title: Substitution
text: Since the first equation already expresses $$y$$ in terms of $$x$$, substitute the expression into the second equation for $$y$$.

title: Substituted Expression
text: What is the resulting expression in terms of only $$x$$ after simplifying?

title: Factoring Expression
text: To solve for the two values of $$x$$ from the positive and negative result of the $$x^2$$ term, first factor an $$x$$ out of both terms then use the zero product property.

title: Values of $$y$$
text: To solve for the two values of $$y$$, substitute each of the $$x$$ values into the first equation of $$y=x-3$$.

title: Larger x-coordinate
text: Out of the two possible solution points, choose the point with the larger coordinate for $$x$$.
